Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.name: cameraButton
Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.abstract: Option for displaying a button to toggle the camera on or off.

Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.name: micButton
Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.abstract: Option for displaying a button to toggle the microphone on or off.

Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.name: flipButton
Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.abstract: Option for displaying a button to flip the camera between front and rear facing.

Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.name: beautifyButton
Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.abstract: Option for displaying a button to toggle beautify feature on or off

Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.name: tokenURL
Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.abstract: URL to fetch tokens from. If supplied, this package will automatically fetch tokens

Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.name: BuiltinButtons
Structs/AgoraSettings/BuiltinButtons.htm.abstract: OptionSet for selecting which buttons are visible in the AgoraVideoViewer

Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.name: videoRenderMode
Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.abstract: The rendering mode of the video view for all videos within the view.

Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.name: enabledButtons
Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.abstract: Which buttons should be enabled in this AgoraVideoView.

Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.name: buttonPosition
Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.abstract: Where the buttons such as camera enable/disable should be positioned within the view.

Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.name: floatPosition
Structs/AgoraSettings.html#/s:14AgoraUIK.abstract: Where the floating collection view of video members be positioned within the view.

Structs/AgoraSettings.html.name: AgoraSettings
Structs/AgoraSettings.html.abstract: Settings used for the display and behaviour of AgoraVideoViewer

Structs/AgoraConnectionData.html.name: AgoraConnectionData
Structs/AgoraConnectionData.html.abstract: Storing struct for holding data about the connection to Agora service

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: joinedChannel(channel:)
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: Local user has joined the channel of a given name

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: leftChannel(_:)
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: Local user has left the active channel.

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: tokenWillExpire(_:tokenPrivilegeWillExpire:)
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: The token used to connect to the current active channel will expire in 30 seconds.

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: tokenDidExpire(_:)
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: The token used to connect to the current active channel has expired.

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: presentAlert(alert:animated:)
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: presentAlert is a way to show any alerts that the AgoraVideoViewer wants to display.

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: extraButtons()
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: An array of any additional buttons to be displayed alongside camera, and microphone buttons

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.name: extraButtons()
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html#.abstract: An array of any additional buttons to be displayed alongside camera, and microphone buttons

Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html.name: AgoraVideoViewerDelegate
Protocols/AgoraVideoViewerDelegate.html.abstract: An interface for getting some common delegate callbacks without needing to subclass.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/TokenError.html.name: noData
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/TokenError.html.abstract: No data returned from the token request

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/TokenError.html.name: invalidData
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/TokenError.html.abstract: Data corrupted or in the wrong format

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/Style.html#/s:1.name: grid
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/Style.html#/s:1.abstract: grid lays out all the videos in an NxN grid, regardless of how many there are.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/Style.html#/s:1.name: floating
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/Style.html#/s:1.abstract: floating keeps track of the active speaker, displays them larger and the others in a collection view.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: delegate
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Delegate for the AgoraVideoViewer, used for some important callback methods.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: agoraSettings
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Settings and customisations such as position of on-screen buttons, collection view of all channel members,

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/Style.html.name: Style
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/Style.html.abstract: Style and organisation to be applied to all the videos in this view.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: activeSpeaker
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: The most recently active speaker in the session. This will only ever be set to remote users, not the local user.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: overrideActiveSpeaker
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: This user will be the main focus when using .floating style.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: userRole
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Gets and sets the role for the user. Either .audience or .broadcaster.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: agkit
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: AgoraRtcEngineKit being used by this AgoraVideoViewer.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: style
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Style and organisation to be applied to all the videos in this AgoraVideoViewer.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: init(connectionData:style:agoraSettings:delegate:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Creates an AgoraVideoViewer object, to be placed anywhere in your application.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: fills(view:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Helper method to fill a view with this view

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: collectionView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Asks your data source object for the cell that corresponds to the specified item in the collection view.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: collectionView(_:numberOfItemsInSection:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Asks your data source object for the number of items in the specified section.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: collectionView(_:willDisplay:forItemAt:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified cell is about to be displayed in the collection view.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: collectionView(_:didEndDisplaying:forItemAt:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified cell was removed from the collection view.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: collectionView(_:didSelectItemAt:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Tells the delegate that the item at the specified index path was selected.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:didClientRoleChanged:newRole:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Called when the user role successfully changes

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:didJoinedOfUid:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: New User joined the channel

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:remoteAudioStateChangedOfUid:state:reason:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: This callback indicates the state change of the local audio stream, including the state of the audio recording and encoding, and allows you to troubleshoot issues when exceptions occur.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:didOfflineOfUid:reason:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when a remote user (Communication)/host (Live Broadcast) leaves a channel. Same as userOfflineBlock.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:activeSpeaker:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the most active speaker is detected.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:remoteVideoStateChangedOfUid:state:reason:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the remote video state changes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:localVideoStateChange:error:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the local video stream state changes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:localAudioStateChange:error:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the local audio state changes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:firstLocalAudioFramePublished:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the first audio frame is published.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngineRequestToken(_:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the token expires.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: rtcEngine(_:tokenPrivilegeWillExpire:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Occurs when the token expires in 30 seconds.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: getCameraButton()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Get the button for enabling/disabling the camera

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: getMicButton()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Get the button for muting/unmuting the microphone

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: getScreenShareButton()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Get the button for sharing the current screen

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: getFlipButton()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Get the button for flipping the camera from front to rear facing

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: getBeautifyButton()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Get the button for enabling/disabling the beautify effect.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: checkForPermissions(alsoRequest:callback:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Helper function to check if we currently have permission to use the camera and microphone

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: requestCameraAccess(handler:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Request access to use the camera.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: requestMicrophoneAccess(handler:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Request access to use the microphone.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/TokenError.html.name: TokenError
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer/TokenError.html.abstract: Error types to expect from fetchToken on failing ot retrieve valid token.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Requests the token from our backend token service

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: toggleCam()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Toggle the camera between on and off

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: toggleMic()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Toggle the microphone between on and off

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: toggleScreenShare()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Turn screen sharing on/off

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: toggleBeautify()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Turn on/off the ‘beautify’ effect. Visual and voice change.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: flipCamera()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Swap between front and back facing camera.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.name: toggleBroadcast()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/c:@CM@Ago.abstract: Toggle between being a host or a member of the audience.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: setRole(to:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Change the role of the local user when connecting to a channel

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: join(channel:as:fetchToken:uid:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Join the Agora channel using token stored in AgoraVideoViewer object

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: join(channel:with:as:uid:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Join the Agora channel

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: leaveChannel(_:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Leave channel stops all preview elements

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: updateToken(_:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Update the token currently in use by the Agora SDK. Used to not interrupt an active video session.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.name: exit()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewer.html#/s:14Agora.abstract: Leave any open channels and kills the Agora Engine instance.
